title: Christmas Gift Exchange Drawing + Draft Commercial Jingles + We Talk To Amy's Nephew Who Is A Meat Scientist…No, Really A MEAT SCIENTIST! + Ryan Hurd Stops By With A GIANT Reese’s Peanut Butter Cup Pie!
itunes:title: Christmas Gift Exchange Drawing + Draft Commercial Jingles + We Talk To Amy's Nephew Who Is A Meat Scientist…No, Really A MEAT SCIENTIST! + Ryan Hurd Stops By With A GIANT Reese’s Peanut Butter Cup Pie!
description:
We drew names and announced the theme for our annual Bobby Bones Show Christmas Gift exchange! Bobby talks to Amy’s nephew who is a meat scientist. He answers all of our weird questions about his job and MEAT. Ryan Hurd stops by to have us taste test the Reese’s 9 inch pie that sold out everywhere, his grammy nomination and first No. 1 song as an artist. Plus, we draft the Best Commerical Jingles!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
